author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-IMF Bentham Confirms Receipt Of US$57.4 Mln In Cash Sale Proceeds From Sale
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Imf Bentham Ltd:
* CONFIRMS RECEIPT OF US$57.4 MILLION IN CASH SALE PROCEEDS FROM SALE OF MAJORITY OF ITS US INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO TO ITS US FUND.
* CO ENTITLED TO 85% OF ANY PROFITS ON SALE INVESTMENTS REALISED BY FUND 1 AFTER PAYMENT OF PREFERRED DIVIDENDS & OTHER EXPENSES OF FUNDâ€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
